functions.name: SelectTrigger
functions.description: Trigger/button for Radix Select with styling, icon, and proper focus ring.

functions.name: SelectContent
functions.description: Portal-wrapped content panel for the select with scroll buttons and viewport sizing.

functions.name: SelectItem / SelectLabel / SelectSeparator
functions.signature: const SelectItem = React.forwardRef(...); const SelectLabel = React.forwardRef(...); const SelectSeparator = React.forwardRef(...)
functions.description: Item components for select lists including selection indicator icon and label/separator helpers.

functions.name: Textarea
functions.signature: const Textarea = React.forwardRef<HTMLTextAreaElement, TextareaProps>((props, ref) => JSX.Element)
functions.description: Styled textarea component that forwards ref and centralizes textarea styling for the design system.
